verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> Bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul: <S%H5315><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is within <S%H7130><s%> me, bless his holy <S%H6944><s%> name. <S%H8034><s%>
Bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul, <S%H5315><s%> and forget <S%H7911><s%> not all <S%H3605><s%> his benefits: <S%H1576><s%>
Who forgives <S%H5545><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your iniquities; <S%H5771><s%> who heals <S%H7495><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your diseases; <S%H8463><s%>
Who redeems <S%H1350><s%> your life <S%H2416><s%> from destruction; <S%H7845><s%> who crowns <S%H5849><s%> you with loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and tender mercies; <S%H7356><s%>
Who satisfies <S%H7646><s%> your mouth <S%H5716><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%> things; so that your youth <S%H5271><s%> is renewed <S%H2318><s%> like the eagle's. <S%H5404><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> executes <S%H6213><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> that are oppressed. <S%H6231><s%>
He made known <S%H3045><s%> his ways <S%H1870><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> his acts <S%H5949><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> is merciful <S%H7349><s%> and gracious, <S%H2587><s%> slow <S%H750><s%> to anger, <S%H639><s%> and plenteous <S%H7227><s%> in mercy. <S%H2617><s%>
He will not always <S%H5331><s%> chide: <S%H7378><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will he keep <S%H5201><s%> his anger for ever. <S%H5769><s%>
He has not dealt <S%H6213><s%> with us after our sins; <S%H2399><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> rewarded <S%H1580><s%> us according to our iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>

For as the heaven <S%H8064><s%> is high <S%H1361><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> so great <S%H1396><s%> is his mercy <S%H2617><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him.
As far <S%H7350><s%> as the east <S%H4217><s%> is from the west, <S%H4628><s%> so far <S%H7350><s%> has he removed <S%H7368><s%> our transgressions <S%H6588><s%> from us.
Like as a father <S%H1><s%> pities <S%H7355><s%> his children, <S%H1121><s%> so the LORD <S%H3068><s%> pities <S%H7355><s%> them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him.
For he knows <S%H3045><s%> our frame; <S%H3336><s%> he remembers <S%H2142><s%> that we are dust. <S%H6083><s%>
As for man, <S%H582><s%> his days <S%H3117><s%> are as grass: <S%H2682><s%> as a flower <S%H6731><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> so <S%H3652><s%> he flourishes. <S%H6692><s%>

For the wind <S%H7307><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> it, and it is gone; <S%H369><s%> and the place <S%H4725><s%> thereof shall know <S%H5234><s%> it no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%>

But the mercy <S%H2617><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to everlasting <S%H5769><s%> on them that fear <S%H3373><s%> him, and his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> to children's <S%H1121><s%> children; <S%H1121><s%>
To such as keep <S%H8104><s%> his covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and to those that remember <S%H2142><s%> his commandments <S%H6490><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> them.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> has prepared <S%H3559><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> in the heavens; <S%H8064><s%> and his kingdom <S%H4438><s%> rules <S%H4910><s%> over all. <S%H3605><s%>

Bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> you his angels, <S%H4397><s%> that excel <S%H1368><s%> in strength, <S%H3581><s%> that do <S%H6213><s%> his commandments, <S%H1697><s%> hearkening <S%H8085><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his word. <S%H1697><s%>
Bless <S%H1288><s%> you the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> you his hosts; <S%H6635><s%> you ministers <S%H8334><s%> of his, that do <S%H6213><s%> his pleasure. <S%H7522><s%>

Bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his works <S%H4639><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> places <S%H4725><s%> of his dominion: <S%H4475><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
